benchmark_details.name: MAPEX: A Multi-Agent Pipeline for Keyphrase Extraction
benchmark_details.overview: MAPEX introduces a multi-agent pipeline for keyphrase extraction that coordinates LLM-based agents through multiple modules to enhance the extraction quality, adapting dynamically to document lengths.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To improve the performance of keyphrase extraction through multi-agent collaboration and a dual-path strategy based on document length.

data.source: Inspec, SemEval-2010, SemEval-2017, DUC2001, NUS, Krapivin datasets.

methodology.calculation: F1 score calculated using precision and recall metrics based on the predicted and actual keyphrases.
methodology.interpretation: Higher F1 score indicates better performance in capturing relevant keyphrases.
methodology.validation: Validated through extensive experiments on benchmark datasets.
